system.description:
This spell grants one creature powerful protection against mental effects for 1 hour per caster level. An unwilling target may make a saving throw vs. spells to resist.

Effects:

  • The target is completely immune to ESP, clairvoyance, clairaudience, crystal ball gazing, and similar magical detection.
  • Prevents magical information gathering (such as contact higher plane or summon object).
  • For the duration, the caster or recipient effectively does not exist to these effects.
  • The target gains +8 to all saving throws against charm, illusion, phantasms, feeblemind, and other mental attacks.
  • A natural roll of 1 always fails, regardless of bonuses.
system.effect: Grants immunity to mind-affecting magic and +8 to saves vs. mental attacks
